page.title: 08A FANTASTIC DAY AT BRID
page.content: On one Saturday we got up at 8.30am because our family was going to Brid. I got dressed and went downstairs for my breakfast and then I brushed my teeth. At 9.30 we set off and eventually we got there at approx 11am. Me and my brother went on the bumper boats in the water and I got wet through. We went in a cafe for our dinner. After our dinner we went on the big slide for ten minutes and then we went on the beach and I put my trunks on and went into the sea with my rubber life ring. By now it was 3.45 and we went to the amusements for half an hour and then we set off home. When we got home we had our tea and I went out to play.
